section.name: MetaData Extensions
section.p: A container may support features beyond and above standard DNA lifecycle processing. These container extensions are given an identifier and this allows components to refer to specific extensions and declare their compatibility with the extension.

Extension names are derived from the package name of the annotations that they support. For example, a container that supports the com.biz.security.SecurityRole implements the container extension com.biz.security.

The development of container extensions can be broken down into two parts. Documenting and designing the metadata a component has to expose for container extension and implementing the container extension. The implementation of container extensions is beyond the scope of this document.
